verbs.description: “ Hawaii [V: is] showing the Trump administration that the states will stand up for our kids , even when Washington will not . ”
“ [ARG0: Hawaii] is [V: showing] [ARG2: the Trump administration] [ARG1: that the states will stand up for our kids , even when Washington will not] . ”
“ Hawaii is showing the Trump administration that the states [V: will] stand up for our kids , even when Washington will not . ”
“ Hawaii is showing the Trump administration that [ARG1: the states] [ARGM-MOD: will] [V: stand] up [ARGM-GOL: for our kids] , [ARGM-TMP: even when Washington will not] . ”
“ Hawaii is showing the Trump administration that the states will stand up for our kids , even when Washington [V: will] not . ”
